meanings.sent1: The letter was frankable, so I could send it without paying for postage.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure only frankable items are sent through the mail.
meanings.sent3: I found a clever way to use the frankable stamp on my postcard.
meanings.sent4: Her honesty was like a frankable stamp, marking her words with sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The frankable label on the package made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.sent1: Only official documents are considered frankable for free postage.
meanings.sent2: The package met all the requirements to be deemed frankable.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to sneak into the mailroom to find something frankable to play with.
meanings.sent4: His actions were as clear and straightforward as a frankable document.
meanings.sent5: The frankable envelope contained important information for the meeting.
